import { IonContent, IonItem, IonLabel, IonCard, IonAccordion, IonAccordionGroup, IonText, } from '@ionic/react'; import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ViewUserCourse: React.FC<{ quiz: any[], topic: any[], course_name: string, courseId: string, }> = (props) => { var today = new Date(); const current_date = today.getFullYear() + '-' + (today.getMonth() + 1) + '-' + today.getDate(); return ( <>

{props.course_name}

 <> Quiz
{props.quiz.map((item: any, i: any) =>
{item.quiz_name} {item.date == current_date ?

New

:

Date expired

}
)}
{props.topic.map((item: any, i: any) => {item.topic_name}
{item.topic_article.length == 0 && item.topic_content.length == 0 ? 'No data preview' : <> {item.topic_article.map((ta: any, i: any) => {ta.name} )} {item.topic_content.map((tc: any, i: any) => file )} }
)} ); } export default ViewUserCourse;
